dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Volkan Ungan [mailto:numbhead@gmail.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 07, 2005 3:47 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement


Dear Sir/Madam

I, behalf of  Sebnem Ferah and Esen Entertainments, urge you to remove the
copyrighted material of our artist/company, and also warn the subscriber of
this material. The copyrighted material is located at
http://70.84.43.54/MP3_Sarayi/makkaya/sebnem.ferah-cam.kiriklari-makkaya2003
-sipacik.de.rar

Distributing copyrighted material is disallowed by international laws and is
under penalty. Therefore, we ask you to remove these files within 2 days of
notice, after the end of this notice our company lawyers will head to court
and RIAA.

Thank you in advance.

Volkan Ungan
Esen Entertainments
